title: Serene Yarra Ranges Peppers Escape 90 Minutes from Melbourne with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Discover the magic of Victoria's breathtaking Yarra Valley region with a relaxing stay right in the heart of Marysville. Just 90 minutes from Melbourne, the newly reimagined Peppers Marysville, is perfectly positioned to make exploring the pristine beauty of the area a breeze, with the Yarra Ranges, Cathedral Ranges, Kinglake National Park and an abundance of acclaimed Yarra Valley wineries all just a short hop away. The winter months are even better - cross country skiing, tobogganing and snow play at nearby Lake Mountain await.

After expansive renovations, Peppers Marysville now boasts countless modern flourishes, including a luxury onsite wellness spa and sauna and brand-new Andiamo Restaurant and Bar, cementing the hotel as the perfect spot for an indulgent and blissful romantic escape. Take the time to soak up serenity with a swim in the long, heated pool that overlooks lush green landscapes, challenge a loved one to a tennis game on the resort's scenic grounds or take a seat at Andiamo Restaurant and Bar for farm-to-table-inspired plates.

title: Peppers Marysville Luxury near Yarra Valley with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Be invigorated by the beauty of Marysville, set in Victoria's breathtaking Yarra Valley, with a relaxing stay at Peppers Marysville - just 90 minutes from Melbourne and 35 minutes from Healesville. Nestled in the heart of this friendly town, the hotel makes exploring the pristine beauty of the region a breeze, with the Yarra Ranges, Cathedral Ranges, Kinglake National Park and gorgeous Yarra Valley wineries all within an easy drive.

This is the perfect spot for an indulgent romantic escape and the perfect place to unwind after days of discovering the many marvels this region holds. Be instantly relaxed with a swim in the long, heated pool that overlooks the lush green landscapes, challenge someone to a tennis game on the scenic grounds of the resort, move your body at the fully equipped gymnasium or take a seat at Radius Bar & Grill, where locally sourced produce is the star of the innovative menu. The choice is all yours.

title: Stylish Yarra Valley Escape with Daily Buffet Breakfast
description: Experience the beautiful town of Marysville with a relaxing stay at Vibe Hotel Marysville, just 90 minutes from Melbourne. Perfectly placed for exploring the natural beauty of the region with the Yarra Ranges, Cathedral Ranges and Kinglake National Park all within easy reach, as well as the renowned wines and gourmet produce of the Yarra Valley, this is the perfect spot for an indulgent romantic escape. Unwind with daily buffet breakfast, a bottle of wine on arrival and A$50 dining credit at Radius Bar & Grill; plus your guaranteed 1pm checkout means you can end your stay with a long sleep-in.

title: Serene Yarra Valley Peppers Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Discover the magic of Victoria’s breathtaking Yarra Valley region with a relaxing stay right in the heart of Marysville. Just a short drive from central Melbourne, Peppers Marysville is perfectly positioned to explore the abundance of highly acclaimed wineries in the sprawling Yarra Valley. 

When you aren't sampling Victoria's finest vintages and innovative drops, the rolling Cathedral Ranges, national parks and alpine resorts await.

Peppers Marysville boasts countless modern flourishes, including a luxury onsite wellness spa and sauna and Andiamo Restaurant and Bar, cementing the hotel as the perfect spot for an indulgent and blissful romantic escape. 

Take the time to soak up serenity with a swim in the long, heated pool that overlooks lush green landscapes or challenge a loved one to a tennis game on the resort’s scenic grounds.

title: Year-Round Nature-Lover's Paradise
description: Experience the beautiful town of Marysville with a stay at Vibe Hotel Marysville, just under two hours from Melbourne. Enjoy daily buffet breakfasts, a daily wine, beer or soft drink each, an AU$50 dining credit at Radius Bar & Grill and sleep in with a midday checkout. Family options available!
